input: What is Cannibal.co?
output: Cannibal.co is a clothing brand based in Galle, Sri Lanka, offering a wide range of apparel and accessories.

input: What kind of products do you sell?
output: We offer a variety of clothing and accessories, including shirts, t-shirts, caps, bags, and purses.

input: Where is Cannibal.co located?
output: Cannibal.co is located in Galle, Sri Lanka.

input: How can I purchase your products?
output: You can purchase our products through our official website or visit our store in Galle.

input: Do you offer online shopping?
output: Yes, we offer online shopping through our website with delivery services across Sri Lanka.

input: What payment methods do you accept?
output: We accept payments via credit/debit cards, bank transfers, and cash on delivery (COD).

input: Do you offer international shipping?
output: Currently, we only ship within Sri Lanka. International shipping options will be available soon.

input: How can I contact customer support?
output: You can contact our support team via email at support@cannibal.co or call us at +94XXXXXXXXX.

input: What is your return policy?
output: We accept returns within 14 days of purchase, provided the item is unused and in its original condition.

input: How long does shipping take?
output: Standard delivery takes 3-5 business days within Sri Lanka. Express delivery options are also available.

input: Do you offer custom designs or printing services?
output: Yes, we provide custom design and printing services for bulk orders.

input: Do you have physical stores?
output: Yes, we have a flagship store in Galle, Sri Lanka.

input: Can I track my order?
output: Yes, once your order is shipped, you will receive a tracking link via email.

input: Do you have discounts or promotions?
output: Yes, we offer seasonal discounts and exclusive deals. Follow us on social media for updates.

input: Can I cancel my order?
output: Orders can be canceled within 24 hours of placing them. Contact support for assistance.

input: Do you offer gift cards?
output: Yes, we offer digital and physical gift cards.

input: What sizes do you offer?
output: We offer a wide range of sizes from XS to XXL. Size charts are available on our website.

input: Are your products eco-friendly?
output: Yes, we use sustainable materials and eco-friendly packaging wherever possible.

input: How do I know my size?
output: You can refer to our size chart available on the product pages.

input: Do you offer wholesale purchases?
output: Yes, we provide wholesale options for bulk orders. Contact us for more details.

input: Do you have a loyalty program?
output: Yes, we offer a rewards program where you can earn points for purchases and referrals.

input: Do you restock sold-out items?
output: Yes, some popular items are restocked periodically. Sign up for notifications on our website.

input: Can I exchange an item?
output: Yes, exchanges are accepted within 14 days of purchase if the item is unworn and in its original condition.

input: Do you provide bulk orders for corporate events?
output: Yes, we offer bulk orders for corporate events and team uniforms.

input: How can I become a brand ambassador?
output: We have a brand ambassador program. You can apply through our website.

input: Do you have a social media presence?
output: Yes, you can find us on Instagram, Facebook, and TikTok for updates and promotions.

input: Do you offer cash on delivery?
output: Yes, we offer COD for selected areas within Sri Lanka.

input: How do I apply a discount code?
output: You can enter your discount code at checkout before completing your purchase.

input: What materials are your products made from?
output: Our products are made from high-quality cotton, polyester, and sustainable fabrics.

input: Do you provide alteration services?
output: Currently, we do not offer alteration services.

input: Can I pre-order items?
output: Yes, we offer pre-orders for upcoming collections.

input: Do you have a mobile app?
output: Not yet, but we are working on launching our mobile app soon.

input: Can I customize a design?
output: Yes, we offer customization services for bulk orders.

input: What happens if I receive a damaged item?
output: Contact our support team immediately, and we will arrange a replacement or refund.

input: Do you have limited edition collections?
output: Yes, we release limited edition collections periodically.

input: Are your products unisex?
output: Yes, many of our designs are unisex and suitable for all genders.

input: Do you offer kids' clothing?
output: Yes, we have a collection for kids as well.

input: Can I return an item bought on sale?
output: Sale items are generally non-refundable, but exceptions may apply.

input: Do you collaborate with influencers?
output: Yes, we frequently collaborate with influencers and brand ambassadors.

input: How often do you release new collections?
output: We release new collections every season.

input: Do you have a store pickup option?
output: Yes, you can choose store pickup at checkout if you prefer.

input: Do you sell gift wrapping services?
output: Yes, we offer gift wrapping services for a small additional charge.

input: Are there any membership perks?
output: Yes, our members get exclusive discounts and early access to sales.

input: What happens if my order is delayed?
output: If your order is delayed, contact our support team for assistance.

input: Can I request a refund?
output: Yes, refunds are available for eligible returns.

input: How can I leave a review?
output: You can leave a review on our website under the product page.
